accounts.name: duplicationFlag
docs: by initializing this account we mark the validator as added

accounts.name: mintTo
docs: user mSOL Token account to send the mSOL

accounts.name: mintTo
docs: user mSOL Token account to send the mSOL

fields.name: circulatingTicketCount
docs: count tickets for delayed-unstake

fields.name: circulatingTicketBalance
docs: total lamports amount of generated and not claimed yet tickets

fields.name: pauseAuthority
docs: emergency pause

types.name: FeeCents
docs: FeeCents, same as Fee but / 1_000_000 instead of 10_000

fields.name: lpLiquidityTarget
docs: Liquidity target. If the Liquidity reach this amount, the fee reaches lp_min_discount_fee

fields.name: lpMaxFee
docs: Liquidity pool max fee

fields.name: lpMinFee
docs: SOL/mSOL Liquidity pool min fee

fields.name: treasuryCut
docs: Treasury cut

fields.name: slotsForStakeDelta
docs: set by admin, how much slots before the end of the epoch, stake-delta can start

fields.name: lastStakeDeltaEpoch
docs: Marks the start of stake-delta operations, meaning that if somebody starts a delayed-unstake ticket
after this var is set with epoch_num the ticket will have epoch_created = current_epoch+1
(the user must wait one more epoch, because their unstake-delta will be execute in this epoch)

fields.name: extraStakeDeltaRuns
docs: can be set by validator-manager-auth to allow a second run of stake-delta to stake late stakers in the last minute of the epoch
so we maximize user's rewards

fields.name: validatorAccount
docs: Validator vote pubkey

fields.name: activeBalance
docs: Validator total balance in lamports

fields.name: totalActiveBalance
docs: sum of all active lamports staked

fields.name: autoAddValidatorEnabled
docs: DEPRECATED, no longer used

errors.name: WrongReserveOwner
errors.msg: Wrong reserve owner. Must be a system account

errors.name: NonEmptyReserveData
errors.msg: Reserve must have no data, but has data

errors.name: InvalidProgramId
errors.msg: Invalid program id. For using program from another account please update id in the code

errors.name: StakeAccountWithLockup
errors.msg: You can't deposit a stake-account with lockup

errors.name: LpMaxFeeIsTooHigh
errors.msg: Lp max fee is too high

errors.name: LpFeesAreWrongWayRound
errors.msg: LP min fee > LP max fee

errors.name: TicketNotDue
errors.msg: Ticket not due. Wait more epochs

errors.name: TicketNotReady
errors.msg: Ticket not ready. Wait a few hours and try again

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: Insufficient Liquidity in the Liquidity Pool

errors.name: TooLowDelegationInDepositingStake
errors.msg: Too low delegation in the depositing stake

errors.name: UnstakingOnPositiveDelta
errors.msg: Delta stake is positive so we must stake instead of unstake

errors.name: StakingOnNegativeDelta
errors.msg: Delta stake is negative so we must unstake instead of stake

errors.name: MovingStakeIsCapped
errors.msg: Moving stake during an epoch is capped

errors.name: DestinationStakeMustNotBeDeactivating
errors.msg: Destination stake must not be deactivating

errors.name: SourceStakeMustNotBeDeactivating
errors.msg: Source stake must not be deactivating

errors.name: EmergencyUnstakingFromNonZeroScoredValidator
errors.msg: Emergency unstaking from non zero scored validator

errors.name: RedelegateOverTarget
errors.msg: Redelegate will put validator over stake target

errors.name: SourceAndDestValidatorsAreTheSame
errors.msg: Source and Dest Validators are the same

errors.name: UnregisteredMsolMinted
errors.msg: Some mSOL tokens was minted outside of marinade contract

errors.name: UnregisteredLPMinted
errors.msg: Some LP tokens was minted outside of marinade contract

errors.name: SelectedStakeAccountHasNotEnoughFunds
errors.msg: Selected Stake account has not enough funds

errors.name: WithdrawStakeAccountIsNotEnabled
errors.msg: Withdraw stake account is not enabled

errors.name: WithdrawStakeAccountFeeIsTooHigh
errors.msg: Withdraw stake account fee is too high

errors.name: DelayedUnstakeFeeIsTooHigh
errors.msg: Delayed unstake fee is too high

errors.name: WithdrawStakeLamportsIsTooLow
errors.msg: Withdraw stake account value is too low

errors.name: ShrinkingListWithDeletingContents
errors.msg: Capacity of the list must be not less than it's current size
